verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> and to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%>
Saying <S%G3004><s%> The scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> sit <S%G2523><s%> in Moses' <S%G3475><s%> seat: <S%G2515><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> they bid <S%G2036><s%> you observe, <S%G5083><s%> that observe <S%G5083><s%> and do; <S%G4160><s%> but do <S%G4160><s%> not you after <S%G2596><s%> their works: <S%G2041><s%> for they say, <S%G3004><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> not.

For they bind <S%G1195><s%> heavy <S%G926><s%> burdens <S%G5413><s%> and grievous <S%G1418><s%> to be borne, <S%G1418><s%> and lay <S%G2007><s%> them on <S%G1909><s%> men's <S%G444><s%> shoulders; <S%G5606><s%> but they themselves will <S%G2309><s%> not move <S%G2795><s%> them with one of their fingers. <S%G1147><s%>

But all <S%G3956><s%> their works <S%G2041><s%> they do <S%G4160><s%> for to be seen <S%G2300><s%> of men: <S%G444><s%> they make <S%G4115><s%> broad <S%G4115><s%> their phylacteries, <S%G5440><s%> and enlarge <S%G3170><s%> the borders <S%G2899><s%> of their garments, <S%G2440><s%>
And love <S%G5368><s%> the uppermost <S%G4411><s%> rooms <S%G4411><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> feasts, <S%G1173><s%> and the chief <S%G4410><s%> seats <S%G4410><s%> in the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%>
And greetings <S%G783><s%> in the markets, <S%G58><s%> and to be called <S%G2564><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> Rabbi. <S%G4461><s%>

But be not you called <S%G2564><s%> Rabbi: <S%G4461><s%> for one <S%G1520><s%> is your <S%G5216><s%> Master, <S%G2519><s%> even Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> you are brothers. <S%G80><s%>

And call <S%G2564><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man your <S%G5216><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> on the earth: <S%G1093><s%> for one <S%G1520><s%> is your <S%G5216><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
Neither <S%G3366><s%> be you called <S%G2564><s%> masters: <S%G2519><s%> for one <S%G1520><s%> is your <S%G5216><s%> Master, <S%G2519><s%> even Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
But he that is greatest <S%G3187><s%> among you shall be your <S%G5216><s%> servant. <S%G1249><s%>
And whoever <S%G3748><s%> shall exalt <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be abased; <S%G5013><s%> and he that shall humble <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

But woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> for you shut <S%G2808><s%> up the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> against <S%G1715><s%> men: <S%G444><s%> for you neither <S%G3761><s%> go <S%G1525><s%> in yourselves, neither <S%G3756><s%> suffer <S%G863><s%> you them that are entering <S%G1525><s%> to go <S%G1525><s%> in.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> for you devour <S%G2719><s%> widows' <S%G5503><s%> houses, <S%G3614><s%> and for a pretense <S%G4392><s%> make <S%G4336><s%> long <S%G3117><s%> prayer: <S%G4336><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> you shall receive <S%G2983><s%> the greater <S%G4055><s%> damnation. <S%G2917><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> for you compass <S%G4013><s%> sea <S%G2281><s%> and land <S%G3584><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> proselyte, <S%G4339><s%> and when <S%G3752><s%> he is made, <S%G1096><s%> you make <S%G4160><s%> him twofold <S%G1366><s%> more the child <S%G5207><s%> of hell <S%G1067><s%> than yourselves. <S%G5216><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, you blind <S%G5185><s%> guides, <S%G3595><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by the temple, <S%G3485><s%> it is nothing; <S%G3762><s%> but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by the gold <S%G5557><s%> of the temple, <S%G3485><s%> he is a debtor! <S%G3784><s%>

You fools <S%G3474><s%> and blind: <S%G5185><s%> for whether <S%G5101><s%> is greater, <S%G3187><s%> the gold, <S%G5557><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> that sanctifies <S%G37><s%> the gold? <S%G5557><s%>

And, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by the altar, <S%G2379><s%> it is nothing; <S%G3762><s%> but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by the gift <S%G1435><s%> that is on it, he is guilty. <S%G3784><s%>

You fools <S%G3474><s%> and blind: <S%G5185><s%> for whether <S%G5101><s%> is greater, <S%G3187><s%> the gift, <S%G1435><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the altar <S%G2379><s%> that sanctifies <S%G37><s%> the gift? <S%G1435><s%>
Whoever <S%G3588><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by the altar, <S%G2379><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by it, and by all <S%G3956><s%> things thereon. <S%G1883><s%> <S%G846><s%>
And whoever <S%G3588><s%> shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by the temple, <S%G3485><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by it, and by him that dwells <S%G2730><s%> therein.

And he that shall swear <S%G3660><s%> by heaven, <S%G3772><s%> swears <S%G3660><s%> by the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and by him that sits <S%G2521><s%> thereon. <S%G1883><s%> <S%G846><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> for you pay <S%G586><s%> tithe <S%G586><s%> of mint <S%G2238><s%> and anise <S%G432><s%> and cummin, <S%G2951><s%> and have omitted <S%G863><s%> the weightier <S%G926><s%> matters of the law, <S%G3551><s%> judgment, <S%G2920><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and faith: <S%G4102><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> you to have done, <S%G4160><s%> and not to leave <S%G863><s%> the other <S%G2548><s%> undone.
You blind <S%G5185><s%> guides, <S%G3595><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> strain <S%G1368><s%> at <S%G1368><s%> a gnat, <S%G2971><s%> and swallow <S%G2666><s%> a camel. <S%G2574><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> for you make <S%G2511><s%> clean <S%G2511><s%> the outside <S%G1855><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> and of the platter, <S%G3953><s%> but within <S%G2081><s%> they are full <S%G1073><s%> of extortion <S%G724><s%> and excess. <S%G192><s%>

You blind <S%G5185><s%> Pharisee, <S%G5330><s%> cleanse <S%G2511><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> that which <S%G3588><s%> is within <S%G1787><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> and platter, <S%G3953><s%> that the outside <S%G1622><s%> of them may be clean <S%G2513><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> for you are like <S%G3945><s%> to white washed <S%G2867><s%> sepulchers, <S%G5028><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> beautiful <S%G5611><s%> outward, <S%G1855><s%> but are within <S%G2081><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of dead <S%G3498><s%> men's bones, <S%G3747><s%> and of all <S%G3956><s%> uncleanness. <S%G167><s%>

Even so <S%G3779><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> outwardly <S%G1855><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> to men, <S%G444><s%> but within <S%G2081><s%> you are full <S%G3324><s%> of hypocrisy <S%G5272><s%> and iniquity. <S%G458><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, scribes <S%G1122><s%> and Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you build <S%G3618><s%> the tombs <S%G5028><s%> of the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and garnish <S%G2885><s%> the sepulchers <S%G3419><s%> of the righteous, <S%G1342><s%>

And say, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> we had been <S%G2258><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of our fathers, <S%G3962><s%> we would not have been <S%G2258><s%> partakers <S%G2844><s%> with them in the blood <S%G129><s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
Why <S%G5620><s%> you be witnesses <S%G3140><s%> to yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> that you are the children <S%G5207><s%> of them which killed <S%G5407><s%> the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
Fill <S%G4137><s%> you up then <S%G2532><s%> the measure <S%G3358><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> fathers. <S%G3962><s%>
You serpents, <S%G3789><s%> you generation <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can you escape <S%G5343><s%> <S%G575><s%> the damnation <S%G2920><s%> of hell? <S%G1067><s%>

Why, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> to you prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and wise <S%G4680><s%> men, and scribes: <S%G1122><s%> and some of them you shall kill <S%G615><s%> and crucify; <S%G4717><s%> and some of them shall you whip <S%G3146><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and persecute <S%G1377><s%> them from city <S%G4172><s%> to city: <S%G4172><s%>

That on you may come <S%G2064><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> shed <S%G1632><s%> on the earth, <S%G1093><s%> from the blood <S%G129><s%> of righteous <S%G1342><s%> Abel <S%G6><s%> to the blood <S%G129><s%> of Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> son <S%G5207><s%> of Barachias, <S%G914><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> you slew <S%G5407><s%> between <S%G3342><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> and the altar. <S%G2379><s%>
Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things shall come <S%G2240><s%> on this <S%G5026><s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

O Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> you that kill <S%G615><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and stone <S%G3036><s%> them which are sent <S%G649><s%> to you, how often <S%G4212><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> I have gathered <S%G1996><s%> your children <S%G5043><s%> together, <S%G1996><s%> even <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> as a hen <S%G3733><s%> gathers <S%G1996><s%> her chickens <S%G3556><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her wings, <S%G4420><s%> and you would <S%G2309><s%> not!
Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is left <S%G863><s%> to you desolate. <S%G2048><s%>

For I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, You shall not see <S%G1492><s%> me from now on, <S%G575><s%> <S%G737><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> you shall say, <S%G2036><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
